ack.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
ack.p: SCS and FDZ conceived and designed the experiments; SCS, GFX, GMJ, SFL, YXY, ADC, and FDZ performed the experiments; SCS and DRC analyzed the data and wrote the draft; HKN designed and commented on the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: We wish thank Yang Jian, Dong Jianping and Gao Rui, from the Plant Protection Station of Longchuan County, Dehong Prefecture of Yunnan Province for their great field support. We would like to thank two anonymous reviewers for their helpful comments, which considerably improved the manuscript.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: All authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Availability of supporting data
sec.p: The data set supporting the results of this article is available in the Dryad Digital Repository http://dx.doi.org/10.5061/dryad.s2v53.

sec.title: Ethics
sec.p: All aspects of the study comply with institutional, national, and international guidelines. All experiments were conducted on non-regulated organisms. The study site was rented by Agricultural Environment and Resource Research Institute, Yunnan Academy of Agricultural Sciences and no permits were required to take samples.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This research was supported by Yunnan Provincial Key Fund Program (2010CC002), Middle-aged and Young Academic Leader Training Foundation of Yunnan Province (2014HB039) and International Science & Technology Cooperation Program of Yunnan Provincial Science and Technology Department (2014IA009).
